title: ChatGPT
longDescription: ChatGPT is your personal AI companion that helps you learn, write, create, and solve problems with ease. Whether you're drafting an email, coding a project, studying for exams, or exploring new ideas, ChatGPT provides fast, friendly, and intelligent conversations. Powered by advanced GPT technology from OpenAI, it understands natural language and adapts to your tone and goals — making daily tasks simpler, smarter, and more enjoyable.

title: TikTok
longDescription: TikTok is the leading destination for short-form mobile videos. Create, discover, and share authentic moments that inspire joy and creativity. Whether you're dancing, cooking, or storytelling, TikTok gives you powerful editing tools, trending effects, and endless content tailored just for you. Join millions around the world expressing their creativity and connecting through entertainment in seconds.

title: Instagram
longDescription: Instagram lets you capture and share the world’s moments. Post photos and videos to your feed, watch inspiring reels, explore trending content, and stay connected with friends and creators you love. With built-in editing tools and filters, it’s never been easier to express yourself visually and creatively. Whether for personal fun or brand storytelling, Instagram brings people closer every day.

title: WhatsApp
longDescription: WhatsApp connects you instantly with friends and family through free, fast, and secure messaging. Send texts, voice notes, photos, and videos — or make HD voice and video calls anywhere in the world. With end-to-end encryption, your personal chats and media stay private. Simple, reliable, and available across devices, WhatsApp keeps communication effortless.

title: Temu
longDescription: Temu brings the world’s most exciting deals right to your fingertips. Discover millions of affordable products — from fashion to home goods — delivered with free shipping and unbeatable discounts. Shop smart, save more, and enjoy a seamless experience powered by advanced logistics and personalized recommendations. Temu lets you ‘shop like a billionaire’ without breaking your budget.

title: CapCut
longDescription: CapCut is a free, all-in-one video editor and video maker for everyone. Create stunning videos with music, text, filters, and AI-powered effects — no experience needed. Perfect for TikTok, Instagram Reels, and YouTube, CapCut helps you turn raw clips into professional content in minutes. Unleash your creativity and edit like a pro with ease and style.

title: Telegram
longDescription: Telegram is a cloud-based messenger that prioritizes privacy, speed, and security. Chat with friends, share large files, and create massive group chats or channels. With end-to-end encryption, bots, and customization options, Telegram gives you control over your communication. Sync your chats across all devices — fast, free, and ad-free.

title: Facebook
longDescription: Stay connected with the people and communities that matter most on Facebook. Share updates, photos, and memories, follow pages and groups, and discover content that inspires you. Whether keeping up with friends or building your brand, Facebook is your global hub for sharing life, discovering news, and expressing yourself.
